trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating"></xref> event that occurs when components are added to the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating"></xref>元件會新增到工具箱時所發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating> event is raised when components are about to be added to the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating>加入至工具箱的元件時，就會引發事件。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating>

trans-unit.source: ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs provides data indicating the designer that has requested that the components be added.
trans-unit.target: ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs 提供指出已要求所加入之元件的設計工具的資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The designer host that is making the request.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主應用程式提出要求。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that made the request to create toolbox components.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> ，提出要求來建立 [工具箱] 元件。

trans-unit.source: This property can be `null` if no designer host was provided to the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以是`null`如果沒有設計工具主應用程式提供工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that made the request to create toolbox components, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no designer host was provided to the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>的要求建立工具箱元件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有設計工具主應用程式提供工具箱項目。
